title: User Signup with Valid Inputs
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with valid email, password, and complete initial voice selection and assessment.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page on the mobile app.
Enter a valid email and password.
Complete the voice selection process by choosing a voice option.
Complete the initial emotional assessment questions.
Submit the signup form.
Verify user is successfully registered and redirected to the user dashboard.

title: User Signup with Invalid Email Format
description: Verify the signup process rejects an invalid email format and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Input an invalid email format (e.g., 'user@com').
Enter a valid password.
Attempt to complete voice selection and submit the form.
Verify the signup fails and an informative email format validation error message is shown.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that an existing user can login successfully with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm user is authenticated and navigated to the dashboard.

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify the login process fails with invalid password and displays error without revealing whether email exists.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid email but incorrect password.
Click login button.
Verify login fails with a generic authentication error message.

title: Start Voice Therapy Session with Real-Time Emotion Detection
description: Verify that users can start a live voice therapy session with real-time voice-to-voice interaction and AI-based emotion detection.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the 'Start Call' screen.
Initiate a voice therapy session using the live voice chat feature.
Speak into the microphone; verify that voice activity detection (VAD) activates.
Observe waveform visualization and live transcript display.
Confirm real-time emotion detection is triggered via Hume AI WebSocket and adaptive AI therapeutic responses are provided.

title: Pause and Resume Voice Therapy Session
description: Verify the user can pause and resume a live voice therapy session without loss of data or emotional context.

steps.description: Start a live voice therapy session.
Activate the pause button on the session toolbar.
Verify audio capture and transcription are paused.
Press the resume button.
Confirm the session resumes correctly with voice activity detection and waveform visualization.

title: Text-Based Chat Therapy Session with Emotion Detection
description: Verify that users can conduct a text-based therapy chat with AI emotion detection on messages and receive adaptive responses.

steps.description: Login and open the text chat therapy interface.
Send multiple messages exhibiting different emotional tones.
Ensure each message is processed by AI emotion detection and therapy responses adapt appropriately to emotional tone.
Export the conversation transcript.
Confirm the exported transcript matches the session's message history.

title: User Dashboard Emotional Trend Visualization Accuracy
description: Verify the emotional trend and session summaries displayed on the user dashboard accurately reflect past sessions and journaling data.

steps.description: Complete multiple therapy sessions and journaling entries with varied emotional contexts.
Navigate to the user dashboard.
Verify that emotional trend charts and session summaries correctly aggregate and display AI-evaluated data.

title: Journaling System Entry and AI Mood Insight
description: Verify that users can submit journaling entries and receive accurate AI-powered mood and pattern insights.

steps.description: Navigate to journaling section in the app.
Write and save journal entries describing mood and events.
Confirm the AI processes the entries and displays mood insights and patterns.

title: Subscription Management and Stripe Billing Integration
description: Verify subscription tier upgrades/downgrades work correctly and billing transactions are accurately processed via Stripe.

steps.description: Login and navigate to subscription management.
Select a higher subscription tier and initiate upgrade.
Verify Stripe billing page appears and processes payment successfully.
Confirm user subscription tier updates to the new level.
Attempt to downgrade to a lower tier.
Verify downgrade is processed and billing updates accordingly.

title: Voice Configuration Customization Persistence
description: Verify that user changes to voice personality and therapeutic style preferences are saved and applied in live sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to voice configuration settings.
Modify voice options, personality, and therapeutic style.
Save configuration.
Confirm changes persist after logout and are reflected in subsequent live voice sessions.

title: Platform Uptime and Concurrent Sessions Handling
description: Verify the platform maintains a minimum 99.9% uptime and supports at least 10,000 concurrent therapy sessions without degradation.

steps.description: Using automated load testing tools, simulate 10,000 concurrent sessions across voice and text therapy modules.
Monitor platform uptime, response times, and error rates during load test.
Confirm uptime is maintained at 99.9% or above with latency within performance targets.

title: Security: End-to-End Data Encryption and Data Privacy Compliance
description: Verify that all user data is encrypted in transit and at rest, with compliance to GDPR and HIPAA standards respected.

steps.description: Initiate therapy session sending sensitive user data via voice and text.
Confirm data is encrypted using valid TLS connections and stored encrypted in the database.
Perform audit of data handling/logging policies to verify no unauthorized access or leakage.
Check that data retention and user data deletion actions follow GDPR/HIPAA compliance.

title: Error Handling: Failure of Hume AI WebSocket Connection
description: Verify system behavior and user notification when the Hume AI WebSocket connection for real-time emotion detection drops or fails.

steps.description: Start a live voice therapy session.
Simulate a failure or drop in Hume AI WebSocket connection.
Confirm UI displays an informative error or reconnection attempt.
Verify therapy session continues in degraded mode without emotion detection and system retries connection.

title: Accessibility Compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA Standards
description: Verify that the mobile and web app UI meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and color contrast.

steps.description: Test various app screens (login, therapy session, dashboard) using screen readers.
Verify all interactive elements have accessible names and roles.
Test color contrast ratios on key UI components.
Confirm contrast meets or exceeds WCAG 2.1 AA minimum thresholds.
Verify full app functionality via keyboard-only navigation.

title: AI Therapeutic Response Alignment and Crisis Protocol Trigger
description: Verify AI therapeutic responses conform to evidence-based methods and crisis intervention protocols trigger correctly based on detected emotional signals and keywords.

steps.description: Simulate therapy sessions with user inputs indicating mild to severe emotional distress including crisis keywords.
Confirm AI responses are empathetic and evidence-based in non-crisis cases.
Verify crisis protocol triggers appropriate messaging and support guidance in urgent distress scenarios.

title: User Session Scheduling with Reminders and Resumption
description: Verify users can schedule therapy sessions, receive reminders, and resume interrupted sessions with preserved context.

steps.description: Navigate to session management and schedule a new voice or text therapy session.
Verify confirmation message and notification reminder setup.
Simulate receiving reminder notification.
Resume the scheduled session after interruption.
Confirm session context and history are restored correctly.

title: Admin Dashboard: User Analytics and Platform Monitoring Access
description: Verify admin users can access and use the platform monitoring and user analytics dashboards with appropriate data visibility controls.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to the admin dashboard.
Verify access to user behavior analytics, subscription stats, and platform health metrics.
Ensure admin cannot access unauthorized user personal data outside privacy policies.

title: Chat Transcript Export Accuracy for Live and Text Sessions
description: Verify that chat transcripts for both live voice and text therapy sessions can be exported completely and accurately reflect all exchanges.

steps.description: Complete voice and text therapy sessions with multiple exchanges.
Use the export function to download session transcripts.
Verify exported transcripts include the full conversation with timestamps and emotion metadata where applicable.

title: Latency Validation for Voice and Text Responses
description: Verify platform meets voice chat latency under 500ms and text response under 2 seconds consistently under normal load.

steps.description: Initiate multiple voice therapy sessions and measure end-to-end voice chat latency.
Confirm voice chat latency does not exceed 500 milliseconds.
Conduct multiple text-based message exchanges and measure AI response times.
Verify AI text response latency remains below 2 seconds.
